segments.text: I can't believe my eyes with this kitchen mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her plate, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet fills the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing now, drenching the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle widens at her feetâ€”slippery and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing a dress and apron, stepping right into it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden remains pristine and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A path winds through bushes, so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the boy climbs the stool unsteadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar with glee.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her cookie, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could all go wrong so quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between calm outside and chaos inside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
